import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './TeachForm.css' import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { addClasses } from '../../actions/profile' import Geocoder from 'react-native-geocoding' Geocoder.init('AIzaSyDrLK8VEV5HqhAQR0PeKOx9Pyv0k2ebDv0') const TeachForm = ({ addClasses, history }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ teachersName: '', eventName: '', eventType: '', location: '', geocode: [], eventDate: '', eventTime: '', eventSize: '', description: '' }) const { teachersName, eventName, eventType, location, geocode, eventDate, eventTime, eventSize, description } = formData useEffect(() => { const geocovert = () => { const address = document.getElementById('location').value if (address) { Geocoder.from(address) .then(json => { var location = json.results[0].geometry.location const lng = String(location.lng) const lat = String(location.lat) const geo = lng.concat(', ', lat) document.getElementById('geocode').innerText = geo document.getElementById('geocode').value = geo // console.log(geo) }) .catch(error => console.warn(error)) } } wi }, []) const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (

Teach

Host a class for your neighbors.

{ e.preventDefault() addClasses(formData, history) }} >
